tool_description: Get your hands on the latest news from Google News with our Basic API plan on RapidAPI. With this plan, you can access up to 1000 request per free and a paid plan will give you 40k requests per month. Whether you're a junior engineer or running a smaller private website, this plan is the perfect way to add valuable and up-to-date content to your site. Articles include the title, date reported, large image url, description, news publisher and a link to the full article. With our ultra fast and...
name: Google News Archive
title: Google News Archive

api_list.name: Archived Google News Articles by Start and End date
api_list.description: Google News articles by date range.  Date format should be in MM-DD-YYYY.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-news-archive.p.rapidapi.com/newsapi/period/07-20-2022/09-20-2022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-news-archive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-news-archive.p.rapidapi.com/newsapi/period/{start}/{end}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-news-archive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
